VoxAlpha

Master the Phonetic Alphabet with Speech Recognition

Launch App

What is VoxAlpha?

VoxAlpha is a free, offline-capable web app that helps you master phonetic spelling alphabets through interactive practice and speech recognition. Perfect for professionals in aviation, telecommunications, emergency services, or anyone who needs to spell clearly over the phone.

Key Features

ğŸ—£ï¸ Offline Speech Recognition

Practice speaking the code words and get instant feedback with fully offline speech-to-text powered by Whisper WASM. Text-to-speech currently uses browser API.

Supports NATO/ICAO (English) and DIN 5009 (German) phonetic alphabets.

ğŸ”’ Privacy First

Everything runs locally in your browser. No data collection, no tracking, no accounts needed.

ğŸ“± Works Offline

Install as a Progressive Web App (PWA). Speech recognition works fully offline via Whisper WASM, even without internet.

Phonetic Alphabets

NATO/ICAO

International Phonetic Alphabet (English Mode Default)

  • A - Alpha
  • B - Bravo
  • C - Charlie
  • D - Delta
  • E - Echo
  • ...

Used globally in aviation, maritime, and telecommunications.

DIN 5009

Deutsche Buchstabiertafel (German Mode Default)

  • A - Aachen
  • B - Bremen
  • C - Chemnitz
  • D - Dresden
  • E - Erfurt
  • ...

Standard for German business and administration (DIN 5009:2022-06). Uses city names instead of the old first-name system.
